item.title: Peridyym Shift ep 6 Steve Parried !!!
item.description:
Ever cautious, our adventurers go deeper into the mines … not so much for what awaits within!
Game Scenario based on The Goblin Undertaking, a Roll20.net –based adventure by Larry Roberts
DM:
Alan White—artist & author of The Power Principle www.ThePowerPrinciple.co
Our players are:
Bob Frantz– author of Monty The Dinosaur http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/monty-the-dinosaur-volume-1-bob-frantz/1124324032?ean=9781632292087
Anton Kromoff–Designer, writer: https://www.behance.net/antonkromob9ce
Jim Dietz— Social Media Strategist at Action Lab Entertainment: http://www.actionlabcomics.com
Dean Stahl—Artist/writer Headlock & Headaches http://www.headlocksandheadaches.com/hnhcomics/ladies-and-gentlemen/
Dennis Black & Asian –co-host to Dork Trek http://www.dorktrek.com/
John Bunger –Computer animator, illustrator & DM of Douglas n Dragons! http://johnbunger.com/
Soundtracks provided:
“Five Armies”, “Interloper”, “Ah Dah”, “Majestic Hills”, “Discovery Hit”, “Achaidh Cheide” “Exciting Trailer”
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/music.html
Contact us at
Facebook www.facebook.com/peridyymshift
Twitter www.twitter.com/peridyymshift
Email peridyymshift@gmail.com
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Nothings on ep 269 No impressions
item.description:
Merry Christmas everyone with Donny away hard at work Darrell and Jim got in the last regular show before the holidays
Non spoiler Last Jedi, Oceans Eight poster, Kill or Be killed being adapted, 48 Hours remake in the works, Adams Family animated movie, Luther coming back, HBO previews for programming in 2018,Witcher game being adapted by Netflix, Mr Robot picked up for a new season,Marvels Punisher picked up for season two, She-Ra cartoon in the works, Watergate movie in the works, Ronald D Moore working on a new science fiction show on Apple TV, Roseanne 2018 in March,Venom film set pics, Get Christie Love, Riverdale finale, Battle Angel Alita, Mortal Engines, Annihilation, The Belko Experiment, Top Ten Lists, Lightening round, Blackish, The Brave, Chicago Med, Life Pieces, Moms, Brooklyn 99, Superstore, The Good Place, The Voyeur, Wormwood, El camino christmas, Halt and Catch Fire,Samauri Chef, No Activity, Jean Claude Van Johnson
You can follow us on twitter : @NothingsOn123
http://www.stitcher.com/
https://taylornetworkofpodcasts.com xtremecomedyct.weebly.com
http://www.stitcher.com/
https://taylornetworkofpodcasts.com xtremecomedyct.weebly.com

item.title: Double Page spread ep 204 Best of 2017
item.description:
It's time for the episode you've all been waiting for! The return of the bad boys of "No Apologies"- Gil Colon and Rafael Sanz! They count down their top 10 comics of 2017 with Wendi and mourn the porn stars we have lost this year. Does Tom King take the top spot? Hear about some of the best accomplishments of the year from Daniel Warren Johnson, Mark Millar, Jason Aaron, Kaare Andrews, Donny Cates, Sean Gordon Murphy, Steve Skroce and many other great books both indie and Marvel/DC! RIP August Ames!
Check out the DPS swag store at www.doublepagespread.threadless.com full of t-shirts, tote bags, mugs and more!​
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Go Trek Yourself - ep 27 Tony Shasteen
item.description:
We are joined by comic artist and proclaimed Klingon Tony Shasteen to talk about not only his recent work on the Star Trek Discovery comic series but we also share our thoughts on the recent news of Quentin Tarantino directing the next Star Trek film.
http://theillustrator.com/ twitter:@TonyShasteen You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Heavy Gigs in Sea Side City ep 5
item.description:
"Our rag tag band of 70s heroes are caught in a standoff against Gypsy militia/caterers and biker werewolves! Plus Dan brings the group on a trippy vision, Vanessa's past comes to haunt her, Buddy White kisses his fists and Johnny throws the were-dogs a bone! All this and more on the latest episode of Heavy Gigs in Seas Side City!!""

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 203 Joe Eisma
item.description: Joe Eisma has a history of drawing teen angst, from Image Comics' "Morning Glories" with Nick Spencer to his work for Archie Comics on "Riverdale" and the current "The Archies" with Alex Segura and Matt Rosenberg. "The Archies" takes the teen band out of Riverdale and puts them on the road encountering new problems and special guest stars. He discusses the fun of meeting their heroes like Chvrches, Tegan and Sara and hopping through time to see The Monkees. So discover all the manic joy and pop goodness inherent of "The Archies"! You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Gotham by Geeks ep 72 Tom King
item.description:
With almost 50 issues under his belt we have returning guest Tom King to discuss everything from his first arc to the incredible heartbreaking Batman Annual issue 2 with some teases of whats the come for the next coming year of Batman. We want to thank everyone for the great questions for Tom which made it so hard to pick just two so we added two more additional email questions.

item.title: No Apologies ep 293 Judgmental Niggrahs
item.description:
With Daniel White away still on white boy probation the guys recorded No Apologies episode 293 Trifiling Ninja Loki .The show starts with Darrell Taylor getting angry at Rafael Sanz for posting the Justice League Box office even though he said he didn't care about the film followed by a chorus of the guys yelling but nobody cares since that's Raf catchphrase. Then a heavy Justice League review and discussion of it's low box office and how it effects the future of the DCEU. By popular demand the first House blend latte section of the show as Juan Castro and Rafael Sanz talk tasty coffee, expensive bracelets and club cell phone etiquette that makes Darrell threaten to leave the show for a Culture Trappin exclusive contract . Darrell tells us how awful Marvel Inhumans show was , we talk how good The Gifted has been, The Punisher Netflix show and Stranger Things 2. We are all disgusted by the Russell Simmons Bret Ratner story . During Christopher Keszycki and Gil Colon DC Doomsday Clock review Darrell gets distracted by a video of Alexa Bliss twerking in the Romeo Must Die Group. We talk Alan Moore and creators rights as we go back into a heavy discussion about Doomsday Clock . Comics Juan talks Maestros , Raf talks Power Pack and Silver Sable , Gil , Darrell and Ck talk Action Comics , Detective Comics, Mr Miracle & Batman . Gil gives us a porn corner segment with the return to porn of Tori Black and Teagan Presley and a heart felt Rest in peace Shyla Stylez.
Discount Comic Book Services http://www.dcbservice.com/index.aspx
Instock Trades http://www.instocktrades.com/
Follow us on twitter: @NoApologies123
https://taylornetworkofpodcasts.com/
Sponsors:
Discount Comic Book Services http://www.dcbservice.com/index.aspx
Instock Trades http://www.instocktrades.com/
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Star Wars Conversations ep 50 The Official Version (Hungover
item.description:
Hi Guys,
We recorded this live on the morning after the episode 50 drunk live stream. We are treating this as the offical episode 50 though we still did not manage to do a 50 moments countdown we just talked about 50 random great star wars moments.
Apologies for another random episode - normal service will resume next week.
Thanks to Jim, Frank, Daniel, Richy, Greg, Melvin, Thomas, Andy, Nick, Kevin, Connor, Aydogan and Chris who sent in suggestions.

item.title: Star Wars Conversations ep 50 Drunk Live edition
item.description:
Hi Guys,
We planned to record episode 50 a normal episode but after a few beers we decided this amazing event needed to be live streamed.
the plan was to countdown 5o greatest moments in Star Wars films, unfortunatley we wre drunk and had not fully compiled the top 50 moments.
Apologies for the swearing and randomness - but this was super fun.
Thanks to Jim, Frank, Daniel & Richy who contributed on the night and Greg, Melvin, Thomas, Andy, Nick, Kevin, Connor, Aydogan and Chris who also sent in suggestions.

the plan was to countdown 5o greatest moments in Star Wars films, unfortunatley we wre drunk and had not fully compiled the top 50 moments.
Apologies for the swearing and randomness - but this was super fun.
Thanks to Jim, Frank, Daniel & Richy who contributed on the night and Greg, Melvin, Thomas, Andy, Nick, Kevin, Connor, Aydogan and Chris who also sent in suggestions.
Dont forget this great event: SW40 (9th December 2017) https://www.coventrycomiccon.uk/fargo/

item.title: No Apologies ep 292 Probation Revoked
item.description:
With Darrell Taylor recovering from con crud we recorded No Apologies 292 . The show starts with comic talk as the guys go over Brian Michael Bendis leaving Marvel for DC, Axel Alonso is out as Marvel EIC and CB Cebulski is in , Eddie Berganza sexual harassment story. Christopher Keszycki and Gil Colon love Justice League but it put Daniel White to sleep , Juan Castro and Rafael Sanz tell you how much fun they had with Thor Ragnarok this leads into Starz American Gods and Cate Blanchett In Notes from a Scandal talk , Netflix The Punisher talk , Raf breaks down Scarlett Johansson body in The Island, trailers for The Rock in Rampage and Deadpool 2 , Robert Kirkman Secret History of Comics on AMC the Kirkman vs AMC story. Raf , Gil and Juan talk European commercials this leads into who's porn prime was Better Jena Jameson in The New Devil in Miss Jones or Jesse Jane in Pirates, how bad is Lisa Bonet at 50 , Jasmine Guy has aged badly, Nikki Minaj Paper cover more love for thick Riri Rihanna. We take a trip down memory lane with talk of Al Green, Tone Loc , Young MC , Gil says fuck Camron and MA$E. Al Franken sexual harassment story SNL , Star Trek Discovery , Bob Ross. Comics talk Paper Girls , Saga , DC Metal , Batman the Man who Laughs , Uncanny Avengers , Peter Parker The Spectacular Spider-Man, Justice League comic , Detective Comics, Catwoman vs Talia in Tom King Batman how great was Geoff Johns Teen Titans run , Juan reviews Neil Gaiman Norse Mythology, we talk Super classy publishing by Daniel White . Sugar cookies , bros chat and #life stories with the crew . Finally CK tells you about the depressing list of celebrities at last week's con and how much is it worth to take a picture with Tony Danza. Sponsors:
Discount Comic Book Services http://www.dcbservice.com/index.aspx
Instock Trades http://www.instocktrades.com/

item.title: Go Trek Yourself ep 24 David Mack
item.description:
With Star Trek Discovery on a mid season break we don't stop the party from going on. And to help us celebrate our love for Star Trek we have New York Times best selling author David Mack to talk about not only his recent book Star Trek Discovery: Desperate Hours , Star Trek Titan:Fortune of War and also his original novel Dark Arts: The Midnight Front and more
You can go to his official website http://davidmack.pro/
We want to hear from you so you can email us at thetaylornetworkofpodcasts@gmail.com or twitter us @Gotrekyourself or comment on our Go Trek Yourself like page on Facebook
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork
@Gotrekyourself or our Go Trek Yourself like page on Facebook
http://jkwoodwardart.blogspot.com/

item.title: Go Trek Yourself ep 23: 133 Jumps We Go!
item.description:
Episode 9 is titled
'Into the Forest I Go' directed by Chris Byrne and written by Bo Yeon Kim & Erika Lippoldt
Bypassing Starfleet's orders, Lorca uses the USS Discovery crew's ultimate asset, the ship itself, in an effort to end the war with the Klingons once and for all.
For the mid season finale we cover everything like PTSD, conspiracy theories about who Tyler really is, Stamets sacrifice, Lorcas continued strange behavior, Klingon boobies and more.
We want to hear from you so you can email us at thetaylornetworkofpodcasts@gmail.com or twitter us @Gotrekyourself or comment on our Go Trek Yourself like page on Facebook
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

http://jkwoodwardart.blogspot.com/

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 202- Super Duper Anthology
item.description:
This episode takes us to the International School of Comics in Chicago, where we meet the graduating class of upcoming artists. They are putting together their first anthology of finished work and have so much enthusiasm and excitement for the medium. They tell their stories, with the encouragement of "art mom" Jill Thompson, about bringing new voices to comics, what this particular school has to offer, and what on earth is a "guinea grinder"? All right here in this very special episode.
Contribute to the kickstarter over here- https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1721853155/super-duper-anthology
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: No Apologies ep 291 Gil vs CK
item.description:
With Juan Castro returning from his #life European vacation Join Darrell Taylor , Christopher Keszycki , Gil Colon , Daniel White and Rafael Sanz for our recording of No Apologies 291 Gil vs CK /Chap Stick/ Return of Juan. We start with a short Thor Ragnarok review by CK then go into the Braniac news on the upcming Krypton show. We talk The Shazam casting news . Raf and Daniel rip apart Ben Affleck Live by Night film . Negroes news of the Tyrese breakdown and feud with The Rock. We go into the Kevin Spacey news that leads 2 hours of bad Raf offensive Kevin Spacey jokes. Laurence Fishburn secret Marvel film project , New Mutants trailer , Blumhouse flms, Star Wars the Last Jedi, Justice League, Saving Private Ryan, Tom Hanks , The Fugitive , Tommy Lee Jones , US Marshals, Wesley Snipes , Blade , Black Panther film , DC Legends Tommorow , CW The Flash , why white people love the 80s film E.T. Comics talk Mark Waid Captain America 695 , Tom King Batman , Jack Kirby Fantastic 4 , Amazing Spider-Man, Black Panther comic , Image comics Batman devastator. Daniel DC boxes commission and Julian Lytle Legion of Super Hero daily art leads into talk of who are today's eye catching comic artist. Talia Al Ghul talk leads into Mia Khalifa, Juliana Vega talk leads into Juan and Raf returns of the bros chat . Star Trek Discovery and the future of the films , Shemare Moore S.W.A.T. pilot. The murder of Phil Hartman leads into best and longest Saturday Night Live cast members , Gerardo Rico Suave , Bleeding Cool .
Sponsors:
Discount Comic Book Services http://www.dcbservice.com/index.aspx

With Juan Castro returning from his #life European vacation Join Darrell Taylor , Christopher Keszycki , Gil Colon , Daniel White and Rafael Sanz for our recording of No Apologies 291 Gil vs CK /Chap Stick/ Return of Juan. We start with a short Thor Ragnarok review by CK then go into the Braniac news on the upcming Krypton show. We talk The Shazam casting news . Raf and Daniel rip apart Ben Affleck Live by Night film . Negroes news of the Tyrese breakdown and feud with The Rock. We go into the Kevin Spacey news that leads 2 hours of bad Raf offensive Kevin Spacey jokes. Laurence Fishburn secret Marvel film project , New Mutants trailer , Blumhouse flms, Star Wars the Last Jedi, Justice League, Saving Private Ryan, Tom Hanks , The Fugitive , Tommy Lee Jones , US Marshals, Wesley Snipes , Blade , Black Panther film , DC Legends Tommorow , CW The Flash , why white people love the 80s film E.T. Comics talk Mark Waid Captain America 695 , Tom King Batman , Jack Kirby Fantastic 4 , Amazing Spider-Man, Black Panther comic , Image comics Batman devastator. Daniel DC boxes commission and Julian Lytle Legion of Super Hero daily art leads into talk of who are today's eye catching comic artist. Talia Al Ghul talk leads into Mia Khalifa, Juliana Vega talk leads into Juan and Raf returns of the bros chat . Star Trek Discovery and the future of the films , Shemare Moore S.W.A.T. pilot. The murder of Phil Hartman leads into best and longest Saturday Night Live cast members , Gerardo Rico Suave , Bleeding Cool .

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 200 John Siuntres
item.description:
Double Page Spread celebrates the big 200! This episode is full of insightful discourse, charming banter and listener messages. Special guest John Siuntres is the host of the comic book interview podcast, "Word Balloon" and one of the most pivotal pioneers in comic podcasting. He talks about his history in broadcasting, his time covering boxing for sports radio, the cultural influence of Hugh Hefner, developing life long friendships with creators like Brian Michael Bendis, Art Balthazar and Franco, and the brand new book he has cowritten- "No Plan B: The Art of Michael Avon Oeming".
To coincide with this event there is now "Double Page Spread" merchandise! Everything from t-shirts to notebooks to duvet covers. available at www.doublepagespread.threadless.com
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 201- Kelly Williams
item.description:
It's a treat this special Halloween episode with guest, artist Kelly Williams (WWE, Eerie, Creepy)! A lifelong fan of horror movies and monster comics, he joins Wendi to discuss how to convey creepiness in ink, regional urban legends, horror movie/comic crossovers, Kirby monsters, Vietnam prequels and so much more!
Brought to you by www.dcbservice.com, your leading source for discounts on scary comics past and present including "Afterlife with Archie" and "Jughead: The Hunger".
As well as www.blackphoenixalchemylab.com, purveyors of decadent essential oil fragrances including their latest line of Halloween and pumpkin perfumes.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.media:text:
This week Jim and Darrell hold down the fort while Donny's in the upsidedown. the guy's talk trailers, some news and of course Emails. plus what we are watching Kingsman 2, Non spoiler Stranger Things 2, Deathstroke film news, Zachary Levi, Apple tv creating content, IMAX lost money on Inhumans, Ace Ventura reboot, Major League reboot, Gabrielle Union Bad Boys spinoff, Daredevil 3 gets new showrunner, Lethal Weapon 5, Marvel Runaways trailer, more allegations of sexual assault in hollywood, Winchester:The house that ghost built, This is Us, Mr Robot, The Gifted, Greys Anatomy, Supergirl, Kevin saves the world (Probaby), The Mayor, The Brave, Valor, The Good Doctor, Star Trek Discovery, Blindspot, Best of Worst,
You can follow us on twitter : @NothingsOn123
http://www.stitcher.com/
https://taylornetworkofpodcasts.com xtremecomedyct.weebly.com

item.title: Spirit of 77 Heavy Gigs in Seaside city ep 4
item.description:
"Wolfmen, mind control, Gypsies, and fanboys, all on the back lot of Vizgig studios! Join us as our do gooders get drawn deeper into the mystery of the musky green menace. Dan has harrowing visions of asphalt angels. Vanessa arms herself with ancient weapons of wonder. Johnny discovers some strange future tech in the past, and The Great Buddy White regales a group of avid fanboys with tales of Maniac Crazy-Person and Jackalope Jim. All this and more on this episode of Heavy Gigs in Sea Side City!"â
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Star Wars Conversations ep 45 Solo Player
item.description:
In our 45th Episode, two scruffy looking nerf herders discuss:
Young Han Solo movie gets an exciting new title! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Ron Howard reveals that Tag & Bink will be appearing in SOLO ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- EA Shuts down Visceral Games and moves in a new direction with their upcoming action adventure game ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- New Star Wars Battlefront II single player campaign trailer: ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- One Shot The Last Jedi: DJ (Benitio Del Toro) comic on the way in January ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Rebels Review: Heroes of Mandalore parts 1 & 2 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dont forget theses great event: SW40 (9th December 2017) https://www.coventrycomiccon.uk/fargo/

item.title: No Apologies ep 290 Big white
item.description:
In whitest day , in darky night , no white girl will escape my sight, let those who credit ain't right beware Gil Colon power Kid Dynomite ! In our second attempt at recording of No Apologies 290 the Gil reconnect with black people episode. Darrell Taylor, Christopher Keszycki , Gil Colon and Rafael Sanz are once again joined by Mr. White power Daniel White. We start of talking the review embargo on The Justice League film , the worries of the films time and it's 2 directors and will the Zack Snyder affect hurt the box office and reviews on the film . We are then completely derailed by the negros news section of the show when we go into Gabriel Union and Dwayne Wade sex talk as well as a TV spinoff of her Bad Boys 2 character. The Deathstroke movie news with the director of the Raid . How the fuck did Snoop Dogg Ice -T and Ice Cube cross over to maim stream America. The upcoming Thor movie , Flight of the Concord HBO show . Raf ask if Gil has to reconnect with black people after being around so many white people last weekend which takes the show into a Gil is so white and Jungle Fever segment. We ask Daniel what it was like when he dated a black girl. We talk how Gil goes to the project like it's fortress of solitude to recharge his blackness and play some 2Pac and Biggie. We talk Black-ish. We go over Darrell appearance on The Comic Book Club Live podcast on Tuesday. Tales from the bar with Darrell and Raf. Comic talk the Kamandi challenge, Jack Kirby , Action Comics , DC Metal , Titans , Action Comics, Howard Porter on The Flash, Black Science, Pete Woods on the Justice League comic , Amazing Spider-Man , Steve Stroce and Dave Stewart Maestros. Sponsors:
Discount Comic Book Services http://www.dcbservice.com/index.aspx
Instock Trades http://www.instocktrades.com/
Follow us on twitter: @NoApologies123
https://taylornetworkofpodcasts.com/

item.title: No Apologies ep 289 MY NIGGUMS
item.description:
With Juan Castro in Paris on his #life European vacation Join Gil Colon , Christopher Keszycki , Rafael Sanz and returning co-host Chris Campbell & Darrell Taylor for last night recording of No Apologies episode 289 Welcome to the Niggums Awards. We start off welcoming back Darrell & Campbell after that it's all out mayhem . We cover last week NYCC , tales of Bar Raf sugar cookie Gil , grumpy Ck and the epic story of Darrell taking a $12.99 bottle of white whine to the head and vomiting all over the first night of the illustrious fourth annual Gil Loft party . CK breaks down the controversy of the Marvel Retailer's summit and being AT the DC party as Tom Kings guest and chatting it up with the iconic Frank Miller . Hanging with our brothers over at EOC Jason Wood , David Price and Vince Bonavoglia drinking with white power himself Daniel White , Julian Lytle & Gabriel Perez . Campbell calls back to the Jennifer Connelly being worth 3000 grand for 4 hours joke when he learns what CK spend on a Superman statue at the con, call backs to Darrell breaking his 401k to hit Isabella Soprano at the bunny ranch like Lamar Odom cocaine weekend . We break down the most recent Pacific Rim , Justice League, Star Wars and New Mutant trailers. We learn how much Raf rides for and has in common with Harvey Weinstein which leads to our trial of Raf joke when all the Barista and waitress turn on Raf finally . We even learn Scott lobdell and Bob Harris still work at DC. It's a packed episodes named welcome to the Niggums awards . As a plus if anyone can make a meme out of Raf using this trial of Magneto cover Darrell has got you .
Sponsors:
Discount Comic Book Services http://www.dcbservice.com/index.aspx
Instock Trades http://www.instocktrades.com/
Follow us on twitter: @NoApologies123
https://taylornetworkofpodcasts.com/
You can also join us on the Facebook group TaylorNetwork of podcasts
Also we ask that if you have some time leave us a rating and or ITunes
review because that helps us greatly to promote the show.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 200 John Siuntres
item.description: Double Page Spread celebrates the big 200! This episode is full of insightful discourse, charming banter and listener messages. Special guest John Siuntres is the host of the comic book interview podcast, "Word Balloon" and one of the most pivotal pioneers in comic podcasting. He talks about his history in broadcasting, his time covering boxing for sports radio, the cultural influence of Hugh Hefner, developing life long friendships with creators like Brian Michael Bendis, Art Balthazar and Franco, and the brand new book he has cowritten- "No Plan B: The Art of Michael Avon Oeming".

item.title: No Apologies ep 288 The Worst episode ever
item.description:
With Juan Castro in Spain and Darrell Taylor passed out after watching The Inhumans . Last nights recording of No Apologies was left to the Hateful 3 of Gil Colon , Christopher Keszycki & Rafael Sanz . Titled The Worst episode ever in the 288 episode history of the show . We start with our Rest In Peace to Playboy founder Hugh Hefner . Then we swerved to 90s Image comics like Jerry Ordway Wildstar that's always followed by Gil going fuck him , Jae Lee 1 issue of Hellshock , Keith Giffen Trench and Larry Stroman Tribe , Pitt . This led to talk of how out of place Jack Kirby art look at Image and his Topps comics line . CK reviews Will and Grace revival which led to us asking what old shows would we bring back . We talked about FOX The Gifted Trailer & Gil admits he will watch The Inhumans . Then we lead into 90s Marvel characters Dan Ketch Ghost Rider , Darkhawk , Sleep Walker , Todd Mcfarlane & Frank Miller Talk. Thunder cats , Mumra , Robotech , G.I.Joe do they hold up. We go a little off the rails as we do a Hour of Nothings On the series finale of the 90s Melrose Place spinoff Models Inc , Friends , A Different World , Lisa Bonet vs Jasmine Guy , the Doobie Brothers episode of What's Happening that leads into CK , Gil and Raf awful Michael McDonald impersonations . We go into soft core porn 90s Playboy TV shows Night Calls , Electric Blue , Shannon Tweed , Red Shoes Diaries . How porn on your phone has ruin Cinemax Late night . Talk of Kira Noir and does thick Rihanna breast make coconut water . The Sheldon Chronicles , James Cameron Wonder Woman talk , Kaley Couco , The Runaways on Hulu , Homeboys in outer space , taking a knee . We get to comics Marvel Legacy , Kamandi Challenge , Batman Metal , more Kite Man in Batman , Scott Snyder All star Batman , Wonder Woman , Action Comics getting ready for the Doomsday clock , Jim Balent Cat Woman in the 90s and Some 90s Lobo talk , Tim Drake in Detective Comics , Batman and The Shadow cross over , Blue Beetle , Steve Stroce and Lazarus by Rucka and Lark . We talk Pam Anderson show V.I.P and her bad sidekick Natalie Raitano , Son of a Beach , the Family Matters Entertainment weekly reunion pictures . Gil and Raf rant on NYC Homeless , the train preachers and it's showtime Dancers . We go over how many podcast Darrell host in a week we look at Luke FosterMagnum cast and threaten a Jake and the Fatman cast . By the end even we are bored talking for 2 hours so we start singing George Michaels , WHAM , Culture Club , The Bangles Manic Monday , Cruel summer and Venus by Bananarama . We shout out Ken Junior and thank him for caring enough to listen and comment . At the end Gil , Ck and Raf come to the conclusion this is the worst episode ever and we are just trying to get to the annual Gil Colon Loft Party for sugar cookies drinks and pizza with the 11 clock crew David Price ,Jason Wood , Vince B Daniel White and Chris Kipiniak after we hang at NYCC . If you can make it through over 2 hours of our rambling there some good stuff in there we also shout out Hassan Thalji and congrats to his daughter graduation . Sponsors:
Discount Comic Book Services http://www.dcbservice.com/index.aspx
Instock Trades http://www.instocktrades.com/
Follow us on twitter: @NoApologies123
https://taylornetworkofpodcasts.com/
You can also join us on the Facebook group TaylorNetwork of podcasts
Also we ask that if you have some time leave us a rating and or ITunes
review because that helps us greatly to promote the show.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Star Wars Conversations: Interview with Nick Joseph aka Majo
item.description:
In our 41th Episode, two scruffy looking nerf herders discuss the latest goings on Around the Rim.
Interview with special guest Nick Joseph, who portrayed Major Arhul Hextrophon during the medal ceremony in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
Episode VIII Trailer date confirmed
The return of Forces of Destiny
Ron Howard releases new photo's from the set of SOLO. Deperate and Dangerous Times in the Galaxy
Emilia Clarke filming complete
John Boyega presents a new look at Star Wars Battlefront II

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 199 Dan Panosian
item.description:
Dan Panosian is just a cool guy. He is an artist who has paid his dues for years, working his way up through Image Comics inking people like Rob Liefeld, doing covers for books like "Daredevil" and X-Men titles, pencilling books like "Spelljammer" at DC. He has worked in almost every aspect of comics and is finally ready to bring it all together for himself with the new creator owned book "Slots" from Skybound. A tale of a down on his luck boxer returning to his family and his roots, it draws on classic Las Vegas tropes and new traditions in the glitzy city, delving into the seedy underbelly of MMA and burlesque. Panosian, no stranger to tough guy competitions, is a man who brings his genuine love of fighting to a human story. So join us for talk about Frank Grillo, the evolution of Jumbo's Clown Room, John Steinbeck and a hilarious stripper pole story.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Star Wars Conversations: Darrell vs JJ
item.description:
In our 41th Episode, two scruffy looking nerf herders discuss the latest goings on Around the Rim.
This week we are joined by special guest, Darrell Taylor, head honcho of The Taylor Network of Podcasts!
Darrell tells us why he does NOT want JJ Abrahams to direct Star Wars Episode IX
In Around The Rim we look at:
Episode VIII trailer might be released on Oct 9th.
Ron Howard posts a picture from the set of Han Solo with the comment "Spicey?"
First 9 Episodes of Rebels season 4 air dates revealed.
Darth Vader to cameo in SOLO movie?#
And we have a Star Wars comics round up in Colin's Comic Corner.
Dont forget theses great events: Coventry Comic Con (1st October 2017) https://www.coventrycomiccon.uk
SW40 (9th December 2017) https://www.coventrycomiccon.uk/fargo/

item.title: No Apologies ep 287 The Shadow knows
item.description:
On this episode of No Apologies Podcast join Christopher Keszycki , Gil Colon , Juan Castro and Rafael Sanz . We prepare for the calm before the storm of NYCC . We come to the realization that Darrell Taylor and Chris Campbell have abandoned the show . We talk HBO Watchmen TV show , JJ Abrahams on Star Wars episode 9 , Star Trek Discovery and The Inhumans tv show , Juan reviews the film IT , Insecure finale The Flash tv show , Fat Kanye , Thick Rihanna, Ray J , Kim Kardashian, Metalica, Van Halen , Freddie Mercury and Queen , Live Aid , Farm Aid . We get serious and talk Nazi sympathizer and civil rights. Comics talk Tom King Batman , Gil and Raf talk 80s classic Claremont and Romita Uncanny X-MEN Mutant Massacre, Action Comics , Secret Empire Omega , the state of Image comics Saga , Spawn and the old Marvel writer who left for Image , 80s and 90s What If comics . Fun topics Juan thinks he's as good looking as Javier Bardem , Raf being Puerto Rican and not dating older women does my girlfriend have until she's 40 with me, seeing cocaine in the clubbing days , the Rafael 900 dollar Hooker story in the champagne room . We wish Carlos Carmona the best as his house suffered damage in the hurricane. And Rest in peace to Len Wein . And our usual shout out to Daniel White.
Sponsors:
Discount Comic Book ServicesÂ http://www.dcbservice.com/index.aspx
Instock TradesÂ http://www.instocktrades.com/
Follow us on twitter: @NoApologies123
https://taylornetworkofpodcasts.com/
You can also join us on the Facebook group TaylorNetwork of podcasts
Also we ask that if you have some time leave us a rating and or ITunes
review because that helps us greatly to promote the show.
You can find other great podcastsÂ Â on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and followingÂ @taylornetworkÂ Â

item.title: Spirit of 77 Heavy Gigs in Seaside city #3
item.description: The B-Sides have stumbled into an eldritch conspiracy that threatens the very sole of Sea Side City! Join our groovy gang of go-getters as they dive deeper into the mysteries of the musky, mutating herbs of harrowing, horticultural horror! Witness the murderous machinations of the masked menace known as The 3 Deadly Forms and find out if our funky fresh friends can fend off there fiendish fearful fighting styles! All this and more on this episode of Heavy Gigs in Sea Side City! You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 83 Will Pfeifer
item.description:
Writer Will Pfeifer has had a prolific and intriguing run at DC comics working on such titles as Catwoman, Aquaman, Teen Titans, and Amazons Attack. In this episode he tells funny stories about Jerry Lewis, discusses the Teen Titans cover controversy, lists top NY related movies, and shares what made his Catwoman run stand out after Ed Brubaker. Currently he is working on the Dynamite comic of the popular TNT show, "The Librarians", which showcases his sense of history and intellectual curiosity.
You can find other great podcastsÂ Â on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and followingÂ @taylornetwork

item.title: Go Trek Yourself ep 15 War in Star Trek
item.description:
JK Woodward and Darrell Taylor are back and now on a weekly schedule to celebrate the world of Star Trek as well as review each episode of Star Trek Discovery.
On the eve of the debut of the pilot episode of Star Trek Discovery we touch on the topic of war and how its been approach in all the incarnations of Trek. So join us on our voyage latest voyage and let us know what your thoughts are by either tweeting us
@Gotrekyourself or our Go Trek Yourself like page on Facebook
http://jkwoodwardart.blogspot.com/

item.title: Peridyym Shift Episode 004: The Stranger On The Road
item.description:
Hex, Mervis, Sister Cordwainer and Sellick, joined by townies Rennick and the oddly crimson-skinned Sebaskareth, have encountered goblins on the northern road, as they’d hoped! But who is the mysterious man that jumped in to help?
Game Scenario based on The Goblin Undertaking, a Roll20.net –based adventure by Larry Roberts
Our players are Bob Frantz – author of Monty The Dinosaur http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/monty-the-dinosaur-volume-1-bob-frantz/1124324032?ean=9781632292087 Anton Kromoff –Designer, writer: https://www.behance.net/antonkromob9ce Jim Dietz — Social Media Strategist at Action Lab Entertainment: http://www.actionlabcomics.com Dean Stahl—Artist/writer Headlock & Headaches http://www.headlocksandheadaches.com/hnhcomics/ladies-and-gentlemen/ Dennis Black & Asian – co-host to Dork Trek http://www.dorktrek.com/ John Bunger –Artist of Computer animation and illustration & DM of Douglas n Dragons! http://johnbunger.com/
Soundtracks provided by Kevin MacLeod’s Incompetech https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/music.html
Contact us at Facebook www.facebook.com/peridyymshift
Twitter www.twitter.com/peridyymshift
Email peridyymshift@gmail.com

item.title: Nothing's On episode 257 Fortress of Attitude
item.description:
This week the guys have a packed show, so many great Emails and we discuss week two of the new fall schedule, we talk the new ABC show the Mayor. Plus Harrison Ford stops by and we get a new character!!!! Harry Dean Stanton, Freddy Mercury bio film, Blade Runner sequel most expensive budget of 2017, Jamie Lee Curtis, Game of thrones alternate endings, no review copies of Star Trek Discovery, Sweet Tooth, Red Sparrow, All the money in the world, Patty Jenkins , Fall tv, The Mayor, The Layover, Rouge Night, Girls Trip, Game of Throne, The Hitmans Bodyguard, The Big Sick, Marlon, Orville, Insecure, Party Stories, F##k that's delicious, Norman Mcdonald​

item.title: Star Wars Conversations: The Return of JJ
item.description:
In our 40th Episode, two scruffy looking nerf herders discuss the latest goings on Around the Rim, including:
JJ Abrahams returns to direct Star Wars Episode IX!
Episode IX release date moved!
First six titles for Star Wars Rebels season 4 episodes revealed!
New Star Wars books and comics revealed!This week the two scruffy looking nerf herders are joined by special gues Jeff L Cummings who talks about his upcoming conventions, The Coventry Comic Con and the Star Wars 40th Anniversary convention, SW40:
Dont forget these two great events:
Coventry Comic Con (1st October 2017) https://www.coventrycomiccon.uk
SW40 (9th December 2017) https://www.coventrycomiccon.uk/fargo/
Give a LIKE, SUBSCRIBE and COMMENT BELOW
Social media stuff:
#StarWarsConvo Youtube Channel: tinyurl.com/StarWarsYT ITunes Podcast: tinyurl.com/StarWarsPod Facebook Page: tinyurl.com/StarWarsCFB Instagram:@StarWarsConvo Twitter:@StarWarsConvo Soundcloud: tinyurl.com/StarWarsSC RSS Feed: tinyurl.com/StarWarsCRSS Taylor Network Podcasts: tinyurl.com/TaylorNet Email: ForcedConvo@gmail.com
And contact us @EagleEye1933 and @CaptainColin
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: No Apologies ep 286 Old vs New
item.description:
Juan Castro , Christopher Keszycki ,Gil Colon and Rafael Sanz talked Star Wars episode 9 director steps down , the new Suicide Squad 2 director and X-FORCE director. Radio Head and Daft Punk deep cuts , The Beetles Come together, if Busta Rhymes is a Hip Hop legend, The Bee Gees Saturday night fever album . Daniel White and his white power . We play a game of how old was Juan when he first heard Michael Jackson, Prince and Madonna and how bored he was by they music to depress us and make us feel old . Comic talk Kite-Man makes us cry in Batman by Tom King , we delve deep into Brian Michael Bendis comics Jessica Jones , Defenders and Iron Man, Charles Soule X-Men and Daredevil, Mark Millar classic Old Man Logan , DC Superman ,Green Arrow and Nightwing , preparing for DC Watchmen The Clock story . We end talking Patriots Chiefs and Nicole Aniston new Blacked scene. Sponsors:
Discount Comic Book ServicesÂ http://www.dcbservice.com/index.aspx
Instock TradesÂ http://www.instocktrades.com/
Follow us on twitter: @NoApologies123
https://taylornetworkofpodcasts.com/
You can also join us on the Facebook group TaylorNetwork of podcasts
Also we ask that if you have some time leave us a rating and or ITunes
review because that helps us greatly to promote the show.
You can find other great podcastsÂ Â on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and followingÂ @taylornetworkÂ

item.title: Gotham by Geeks ep 65 Kingdom Come
item.description:
Welcome to Gotham by Geeks a podcast celebrating the world of Batman. On this episode we have special guest Rob Krygier of Geek Brunch Retro sitting in to join in another installment of our book club episodes.
Set in the not so distant future, the DC Universe is spinning inexorably out of control. The new generation of heroes has lost their moral compass, becoming just as reckless and violent as the villains they fight. The previous regime of heroes—the Justice League—returns under the most dire of circumstances, setting up a battle of the old guard against these uncompromising protectors in a battle that will define what heroism truly is.
Kingdom Come by Alex Ross and Mark Waid We want to hear from you on suggestions for future stories to read or feedback for past episodes so send us your emails to gothambygeeks@gmail.com and we’ll read it on the show.
You can also Follow us on Twitter at @ByGotham or check out our Facebook page.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Nothing's On episode # 256 Clowns,perverts and nice guys
item.description:
This week the guys discuss some heavy handed AHS, the hiring and firing in Star Wars, Thomas helps us with week one of the fall schedule. plus lightning round, more news and emails. item.title: Star Wars Conversations Trevorrow Troubles
item.description:
In the 39th episode of Star Wars Conversations, two scruffy looking nerf herders discuss:
This week the two scruffy looking nerf herders are joined by special gues Jeff L Cummings who talks about his upcoming conventions, The Coventry Comic Con and the Star Wars 40th Anniversary convention, SW40:
CCC https://www.coventrycomiccon.uk
SW40 https://www.coventrycomiccon.uk/fargo/
This week's Around the Rim the talk is all about Colin Trevorrow's departure from Star Wars Episode VIII - The Last Jedi, who will replace him and WHAT is going on at Lucasfilm?
In Colin's Book Reviews, Colin reviews the new book... PHASMA!

item.title: Gotham by Geeks Kyle Higgins
item.description:
Welcome to another creator focused episode. And in the spotlight this week is Kyle Higgins who is no stranger to the world of Batman an especially the character of Dick Grayson (Nightwing). Kyle has recently returned to tell a new elseworlds tale focusing on Dick Grayson called Nightwing The New Order We want to hear from you on suggestions for future stories to read or feedback for past episodes so send us your emails to gothambygeeks@gmail.com and we will read it on the show.
You can also Follow us on Twitter at @ByGotham or check out ourÂ Facebook page.
You can find other great podcastsÂ Â on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and followingÂ @taylornetworkÂ

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 197- Mike McKone
item.description:
In this quickie episode, Double Page Spread goes live to Boston Comic Con and sits down with penciller Mike McKone. We talk about all of his work with Marvel, including his legendary turn on "Exiles", his DC work with "Green Lantern", transitioning to covers work from interiors, his love of drawing team books, and what its like to be a roaming vagabond of the convention circuit.
Brought to you by www.dcbservice.com, giving you 50% off when you preorder Marvel and DC trades.
www.blackphoenixalchemylab.com, with a new line of hair gloss entitled "Dog Days of Summer"!
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 196- DC/Looney Tunes
item.description:
Wendi is joined by returning friends, Dan Pua and Andrew Shaw! Together they discuss the recent crossover event b/t DC Comics characters and Looney Tunes, in particular Tom King and Lee Weeks "Batman/Elmer Fudd", Jimmy Palmiotti and Mark Texeira "Jonah Hex/Yosemite Sam" and Bill Morrison and Kelley Jones "Lobo/Roadrunner" specials. Do these succeed in entertaining on all levels or should they sink like Wile E. Coyote off of a cliff?
Also some MMA chat as Andrew Shaw tells us about his recent Brazilian Jiu Jitsu belt testing, and the gang tries to convince everyone why they should watch the now defunct Frank Grillo drama, "Kingdom".
Brought to you by www.DCBService.com, the Discount Comic Book Service, where you can order these DC/Looney Tunes crossovers and so much more for 50% off!
As well as www.blackphoenixalchemylab.com, just because the eclipse has passed, their line of eclipse related fragrances has not!
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Ignorant Bliss 63: Talking Catalyst Prime with Senior Editor
item.description:
I interview Senior Editor at Lion Forge Joseph Illidge about the Catalyst Prime line of Superhero Science Fiction line comics launched this year. Joseph was a former Batman editor, DC Comics and Milestone editor. We cover the goals of the Catalyst Prime line in terms of story and place in the marketplace along with talking about the characters and the titles Noble, Accel, Superb, and the Catalyst Prime Free Comic Book Day issue that launched the line in May of this year.
https://twitter.com/JosephPIllidge
https://www.instagram.com/illmasterone/
Follow Lion Forge:
http://www.lionforge.com
https://www.instagram.com/lionforge/
https://www.facebook.com/LionForge/
https://twitter.com/lionforge

item.title: Nothing’s On ep 284 Blue Fire and restraining orders
item.description:
While Donny is away on tour we have special guest Karly Kingsley to discuss all the recent tv/movie such as the Stand alone Joker film, James Cameron v Wonder Woman, Robert Downy Jr Perry Mason remake, Black Mirror season 3, Bill Nye sues Disney, James Gunn Starsky and Hutch, Inhumans on the big screen, Blade Runner 2 hour run time, Killing Gunther, Disjointed, Mr Mercedes, The Jetsons remake, Doubt, New Spider-man cartoon, the Tick, I'm Sorry and listener questions!!!
https://www.karlykingsley.com/
You can follow us on twitter : @NothingsOn123
http://www.stitcher.com/
https://taylornetworkofpodcasts.com xtremecomedyct.weebly.com

item.title: Spirit of 77: Heavy Gigs in Sea Side City ep 1
item.description:
Here's the new pod I talked to you about. If you could post it on the Taylor Network that'd be great!
" Coming at you straight from the world of 1970s action movies and TV, its Spirit of 77: Heavy Gigs in Sea Side City! Join your DJ Anton and our players, John, Bob Jason and Jim as they embark on a story full of muscle cars and Magnums, Kung-fu and car crashes, Disco, detectives and destruction! Not your daddy's D and D, this role playing game takes place in the 1970s that only existed in movies and TV of the time! Get ready for funky action and cool grooves!"​
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Star Wars Conversations - Which Wan? Obi Wan Movie Announcem
item.description:
In the 36th episode of Star Wars Conversations, two scruffy looking nerf herders discuss:
The announcement of the new Obi Wan movie
Set pics from the set of Han Solo movie
Star Wars Rise to Power mobile strategy game
Force Friday new toys
George Lucas whispers sweet nothings into Kathleen Kennedy's ear
Review of the Marvel Darth Vader comic
Discussion about Adywan's The Empire Strikes Back: Revisited

item.title: Gotham by Geeks ep 63 Feet of Clay
item.description:
Welcome back to another episode of Gotham by Geeks, a Batman comics podcast! Join Darrell Taylor, Russ Latham, Mike Myers, and Chris Campbell as they dive in and discuss a selection of Bat-family comics. All the votes are in for the next book club episode and we reveal it all along with non spoiler thoughts on Metal #1, Chris v Clay Mann, collections corner, Batman creature of the night, Batgirl and the Birds of Prey #11-13, Batman 66 meets The Avengers
We want to hear from you on suggestions for future stories to read or feedback for past episodes Â so sendÂ Â us your emailsÂ Â to gothambygeeks@gmail.comÂ and weâll read it on the show.
You can also Follow us on Twitter at @ByGotham or check out ourÂ Facebook page.
You can find other great podcastsÂ Â on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and followingÂ @taylornetworkÂ

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 195- King Bone Press
item.description:
Since 2011, King Bone Press, the brainchild of Jon Westhoff and Bobgar Ornelas, have been putting out independent, thoughtful work from a variety of creators- the down to earth B-One, the ridiculous monster fighting of Hillbillies, World's Strongest Mailman, Bulletproof Chicken and more. They briefly disappeared off the comic book map, but now, with the help of Jason Ford, one half of The Wombmates and writer of "The Servant", they are BACK! Jon and Jason join Wendi for a hilarious chat spanning years of friendship and some mistaken identity. They've put the band back together and are releasing new books and all their back catalog digitally and they're here to talk about it!
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork
item.itunes:summary:
Since 2011, King Bone Press, the brainchild of Jon Westhoff and Bobgar Ornelas, have been putting out independent, thoughtful work from a variety of creators- the down to earth B-One, the ridiculous monster fighting of Hillbillies, World's Strongest Mailman, Bulletproof Chicken and more. They briefly disappeared off the comic book map, but now, with the help of Jason Ford, one half of The Wombmates and writer of "The Servant", they are BACK! Jon and Jason join Wendi for a hilarious chat spanning years of friendship and some mistaken identity. They've put the band back together and are releasing new books and all their back catalog digitally and they're here to talk about it!
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Ignorant Bliss 60: Let’s talk about the Island #15
item.description:
So when the last issue of the anthology comic Island was released and people saw the cover by the artist Dilraj Mann of a black woman rendered all in absolute black with red lipstick and door knocker earrings hit the internet it caused quite a stir. At the time Ronald Wimberly and I thought it would be worth a conversation. So I gathered some voices from the online debate and some others we knew to have a conversation about his cover, art, editorial practices in comics and voices of black women within the comic industry.
J. A. Micheline: https://twitter.com/elevenafter https://ko-fi.com/elevenafter Darryl Ayo: https://twitter.com/darrylayo http://littlegardencomics.com/ Cheryl Lynn: http://digitalfemme.com/ Jonathan: https://twitter.com/elmcitytree https://elmcitytree.wordpress.com/ Ronald: https://twitter.com/raynardfaux http://d3-14.tumblr.com/
Music in this episode: You Are Luhhh - Frank Ocean Rise - Solange Joy - Leven Kali Boo You Know - Falcons feat. Goldlink Guillotine - Buddy Cool Kids - Kwaye All the music copyright their respective owners

item.title: Ignorant Bliss 59: A Conversation with cartoonist Jamar Nich
item.description:
Ignorant Bliss 59: A Conversation with cartoonist Jamar Nicholas
This episode I’m talking with the great cartoonist, teacher and Philly native Jamar Nicholas. This was a fun episode where we cover all types of topics - old video games, table top gaming, going to arcades in the hood back in the 90s, black folks and being a cartoonist as a whole.
Plus some thoughts on King Arthur: Legend of the Sword and Alien: Covenant.
http://jamarnicholas.blogspot.com/
https://twitter.com/jamarnicholas
Music in this episode:
You Are Luhhh - Frank Ocean
Gospel - Rich Chigga feat. XXXTentacion and Keith Ape
What Gets You High - Osunlade
Big Fish - Vince Staples
Summer Seventeen - Rick Ro$$

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 194 Rich Tommaso/Antony Johnston
item.description:
In this episode, Wendi examines the creators of two very different spy books from Image Comics. Both writers tell stories of the cold war influenced by their impressions growing up.
First, she talks to Rich Tommaso, writer and artist of "Spy Seal". In "The Corten Steel Phoenix" he tells the story of a seal forced into dangerous circumstances beyond his control. He uses anthropomorphic animals to weave a web of politics and intrigue.
After the break, she has a chat with Antony Johnston on the day the film, "Atomic Blonde" is released. Based on his graphic novel "The Coldest City", Charlize Theron portrays MI6 agent Lorraine Broughton in her very cool, calculated style. He discusses his involvement in the filmmaking process and how much it detracts from and stays true to the source material. He has a new series out now, "Ghost Station Zero"- vol. 2 of his series "Codename: Baboushka", an action packed, pulp thriller with a sexy Russian female lead.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Gotham by Geeks ep 61 You Decide!
item.description:
In this episode we get into some of the recent Batman related news about the upcoming DC event Metal. We also clear up some questions about whether Batman is a meta human. Also talk about some things coming up in the Gotham tv show season four which startsÂ Thursday, September 21. Plus the next arc coming up after The War of Jokes and Riddles by Tom King. We bring you up to speed on the current Red Hood and the Outlaws ongoing and Super Sons before digging into the bins for Batman vol 1 issue 165
We want to hear from you on suggestions for future stories to read or feedback for past episodes Â so sendÂ Â us your emailsÂ Â to gothambygeeks@gmail.comÂ and weâll read it on the show.
You can also Follow us on Twitter at @ByGotham or check out ourÂ Facebook page.
You can find other great podcastsÂ Â on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and followingÂ @taylornetworkÂ
Follow this link and vote for which book we cover for the book club or email us your vote to gothambygeeks@gmail.comÂ
To listen to the show you can:

item.title: Ignorant Bliss 56b: Prelude to Culture Trappin & T2: Trainsp
item.description:
On the second part of the episode 56 we continue talk about Darkseid and some of the stories with him being the biggest bad. Next we talk about Marvel Captain American titles and some of the hiring practices on Marvel’s titles. Which leads into a whole discussion on diversity of creators in comics, superheroes movies, folks getting checks for their contributions, thoughts on the health of the industry of comics, juking the stats, making comics and promoting them and more. Also on this episode is my T2: Trainspotting 2review. This is part of two of a two part episode
Follow folks:
Shawn Pryor: https://twitter.com/shawnrpryor http://www.crowntakerstudios.com/
Martheus Wade: http://toshigawa.com/ https://www.patreon.com/MAWProductions
Darrell Taylor: https://taylornetworkofpodcasts.com/ https://twitter.com/taylornetwork?lang=en
Music in this episode:
You Are Luhhh - Frank Ocean
The Passenger - Iggy Pop
25 Lighters - DJ DMD featuring Lil’ Keke and Fat Pat
Ching Ching - Ms. Jade featuring Timbaland and Nelly Furtado
Stars in the East - Tracey Lee featuring One Step Beyond
Dead Presidents 3 - Jay Z
All the music copyright their respective owners

item.title: Ignorant Bliss 56a: Prelude to Culture Trappin & Kong: Skull
item.description:
On this episode I’m talking with Shawn Pryor, Martheus Wade and Darrell Taylor. We talk some Trump and politics then into some Marvel Civil War II event talk with spoilers. From there we talk some DC Rebirth Superman and Justice League vs Suicide Squad and then into some good Darkseid talk. Also on this episode is my Kong: Skull Island review. This is a two part episode.
Follow folks:
Shawn Pryor: https://twitter.com/shawnrpryor http://www.crowntakerstudios.com/

item.title: Ignorant Bliss 57: Black History in It’s Own Words panel at
item.description:
Here in this episode is my quick review of the new movie version of Power Rangers then the complete recording of the Black History in It’s Own Words signing panel with Ronald Wimberly, Chris Visions, Chris Kindred, and Shannon Wright at Fantom Comics in Washington DC from February 15th 2017.
Much thanks to Fantom Comics for hosting this panel.
Enjoy.
Follow folks:
Ronald Wimberly - Twitter @raynardfaux IG @ronaldwimberly
Chris Vision - Twitter @chrisvisi0ns IG @chrisvisions
Shannon Wright - Twitter @shannondrewthis IG @shannondrewthis
Chris Kindred - Twitter @itskindred IG @chris.kindred
Fantom Comics Twitter @fantomcomics IG @fantomcomics
Music in this episode:
You Are Luhhh - Frank Ocean
Power (Remix) - Kanye West feat. Jay Z
Shining - DJ Khaled feat. Beyoncé and Jay Z
Hot Sauce - Young M.A.
Portland - Drake feat. Quavo and Travis Scott
Santorini Greece - Rick Ro$$
The Heart part 4 - Kendrick Lamar
All the music copyright their respective owners

item.media:title: Ignorant Bliss 57: Black History in It’s Own Words panel at
item.media:text:
Here in this episode is my quick review of the new movie version of Power Rangers then the complete recording of the Black History in It’s Own Words signing panel with Ronald Wimberly, Chris Visions, Chris Kindred, and Shannon Wright at Fantom Comics in Washington DC from February 15th 2017.
Much thanks to Fantom Comics for hosting this panel.
Enjoy.

item.title: Sunday Comics Podcast Howard Chaykin
item.description:
Welcome to Sunday Comics Podcast a place for comic fans everywhere and joining us today is comic creator Howard Chaykin to talk about his current book from Image DIVIDED STATES OF HYSTERIA. Chaykin shares his thoughts on the criticisms of the book and his thoughts on the industry from the beginning of his career to the present.

item.title: Gotham by Geeks: Batman Hush
item.description:
Darrell Taylor, Chris Campbell, Michael Myers and Russ Latham cover one of Batman's most financially successful storylines written by Jeph Loeb and drawn by Jim Lee- BATMAN HUSH
You can help decide what our next comic book discussion will be for the next book club episode so subscribe to our twitter and facebook page to see when we post the poll with the books nominated by each host to be voted on.

item.title: Star Wars Conversations: D23 Star Wars News
item.description:
In the 32nd episode of Star Wars Conversations, two scruffy looking nerf herders discuss the latest talk from around the rim, including:
All the latset news from D23:
Break down of the new The Last Jedi behind the scenes reel Kylo Ren's new TIE Fighter Ron Howard's set photo's, Hyper space, Land and Chewie's wife? Disney Star Wars hotel Are fans worried about Colin Trevorrow?
Plus our COMPETITION!!! We need a viewer to create a 9-10 second intro animation for our "Around the Rim" section. Closing date is August 3rd and winner and prize will be announced in the following episode.

item.title: Double Page Spread ep Robert Atkins
item.description:
Happy 4th of July!!! In this very special salute to America, Wendi delves into the history of GI Joe with artist Robert Atkins. He talks about the origins and Larry Hama's tremendous contributions to Joe, his work on the comics from Devil's Due to IDW, the difference bt "realistic military" and "stylized military", what it takes to draw comics for the government, the loyalty of GI Joe fans, the effort to convey Snake Eyes' emotions, the movies and so much more!
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 191 Felix Lu
item.description:
Felix Comic Art is one of the top sites for buying original art from a wide array of popular artists like Chris Burnham, Nick Dragotta, Bryan Lee O'Malley, Riley Rossmo, Skottie Young and more. Art rep Felix Lu discusses what he does for these artists, how he hones his eye for talent, the nature of collectors, what to look for in an original page, how Artists Editions are influencing the market, the fascinating story of Frank Miller's elusive art rep Scott Free, and the Felix Comic Art podcast, where he interviews collectors and artists about their lifetime passions.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 190 Steve Orlando
item.description:
In honor of Pride month, this episode is all about Steve Orlando, the groundbreaking scribe at DC Comics. He gave Midnighter a solo book that made him far more than just "gay Batman" and can currently be seen writing "JLA", "Batman/The Shadow" with Scott Snyder and "Supergirl". He discusses the current JLA lineup, the expanding LGBTQ fanbase, bi erasure in comics, having the determination to try to break into the industry at 13, his creator owned books "Undertow" and "Namesake" and so much more.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 189 Fabian Rangel Jr
item.description:
This week's episode is a lighthearted chat with writer Fabian Rangel, Jr. He discusses the transition from touring with a punk band to his breakout comic, "Space Riders" with Alexis Ziritt. He and Wendi discuss the difficulties of learning new skills in new mediums, the evolution of werewolf movies and his new book, "'Namwolf", the sexy car designs of "Helena Crash", the great work going on at Black Mask Comics and so much more.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 188 Wade's World
item.description:
This episode of Double Page Spread greets the wonderful Wades- Martheus, Janet and 9 year old Anakin. Together they host the podcast "Wade's World" on the Taylor Network. Martha's and Janet discuss their work on the "Shinobi: Ninja Princess" comic, as well as a hilarious description of his work on the Oxygen Network tie in comic, "Bad Girls Club", the "GI Joe" rumor mill, geek parenting, the appeal of ninjas and so much more.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 187- Kill the Minotaur
item.description:
Wendi is joined by the creative team of the upcoming Image/Skybound comics title "Kill the Minotaur". Writers Chris Pasetto and Christian Cantamessa have an interesting resume between them, both having worked on the Norman Reedus/Djimon Hounsou film "Air". Cantamessa directed that, as well as writing the renowned video game "Red Dead Redemption". They are joined on their first foray into comics by artist Lukas Ketner (Witch Doctor) as they tell the classic story of Theseus and the Minotaur in an updated, horror fashion. So listen to why they have turned their talents to the comic industry, what Mickey Mouse is like in Italy, Lukas' love of plush dolls and so much more!
Brought to you by www.dcbservice.com, the Discount Comic Book Service, where you can get exclusive variant covers and discounts on many Image titles.
www.blackphoenixalchemylab.com, purveyors of decadent gothic and romantic fragrances, such as their new scent based on the famous Mutter Museum in Philadelphia.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Sunday Comics Podcast : Christina Strain
item.description:
Welcome to Sunday Comics Podcast a place for Â comic fans everywhere and joining us today is tv and comic writer/colorist Â Â Christina Strain Â who is currently the writer on the Marvel ongoing comic Generation X about the current students enrolled at The Xavier Institute for Mutant Education and OutreachÂ Â and Christina is Â also a writer on the Â fantasy television series that airs on Syfy Â called The Magicians which centers around a group of students that Â discover that the magic they read about as children is very real-and more dangerous than they ever imagined.Â

item.title: Gotham by Geeks ep 57 Wonder Woman comes to Gotham
item.description:
Join Darrell Taylor, Chris Campbell, Michael Myers and Russ Latham asÂ Â they share their love for Batman and the Bat Family and in celebration of the debut of the first Wonder Woman film with some comics celebrating not only Batman but also the princess of the Amazons. So first we do a non spoiler discussion on the new Wonder Woman film before discussing Â Wonder Woman vol 2 164-167 ,Â DC comics presents Wonder Woman #7 ,Â Injustice Year Three #8,Â All New Batman Brave and the bold #7, Wonder Woman vol 2 #101
We want to hear from you on suggestions for future stories to read or feedback for past episodes Â so sendÂ Â us your emailsÂ Â to gothambygeeks@gmail.com and weâll read it on the show.

item.title: Nothings On: Wonder Woman spoiler episode
item.description:
In this spoiler filled episode we discuss the fourth installment in the DC Extended Universe, Wonder Woman which is directed by Patty Jenkins, with a screenplay by Allan Heinberg and a story by Heinberg, Zack Snyder and Jason Fuchs. Gal Gadot stars as the titular character, with Chris Pine, Robin Wright, Danny Huston, David Thewlis, Connie Nielsen and Elena Anaya in supporting roles.
The crew brought together to discuss this film is Janet Wade, Rocky, Julian Lytle along with regular host Darrell Taylor
http://www.chesapeakefamily.com/fun/movies

julian@thejulianlytle.com

item.title: Sunday Comics Podcast : Adam Glass
item.description:
Welcome to Sunday Comics Podcast a place for comic fans everywhere and joining us today is screenwriter , television producer and comic writer Adam Glass to talk about his current work on The Normals which is about a man who discovers that his life - complete with a family and kids - never happened, and how he must save the world to make his "reality" real. And also Rough Riders: Riders on the Storm which continues the adventures of Theodore Roosevelt, Harry Houdini, Jack Johnson, Thomas Edison and a surprisingly very alive Annie Oakley. We also talk about his previous work with Marvel and DC comics
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Gotham by Geeks ep 55 Batman and Bill
item.description:
Join Darrell Taylor, Chris Campbell, Michael Myers and Russ Latham as they share their love for Batman and the Bat Family. In the first part of this episode Mike and Darrell discuss the Batman themed Fox tv show 'Gotham' , All Star comics #58 and Batman vol 1 #139 and in the second part comic creator and historian Fred Van Lente who recently participated in the Hulu documentary Batman and Bill which is about about the uncredited co-creator of Batman, Bill Finger.

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 186 Frank Barbiere
item.description:
Prolific writer Frank Barbiere is the guest on this week's DPS. He has been involved in a couple of large Marvel crossovers, including his "monster Dirty Dozen" book, "Howling Commandos of SHIELD". He has had quite a cult following from his creator owned adventure book "Five Ghosts' over at Image, detailing the adventures of a thief with some interesting personality conflicts. But now he is telling a new kind of romance in "Violent Love", a tale of crime and love in the late 60s.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Sunday Comics Podcast : Erica Schultz
item.description:
Welcome to Sunday Comics Podcast a place for comic fans everywhere and joining us today is comic book writer, letterer, and editor Erica Schulz to talk about her start in comics and her involvement and work in projects such as Bingo Love, M3, DC New Talent Showcase, Swords of Sorrow: Black Sparrow & Lady Zorro and most recently Charmed from Dynamite publishing. Not only do we discuss our love of comics and the state of the industry but also love of tv shows like Buffy, Angel, Charmed and more so i hope you stay with us through the various tangents. http://www.ericaschultzwrites.com/
twitter: @EricaSchultz42 You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Gotham by Geeks ep 54 Fix My Treadmill!!!
item.description:

item.title: Sunday Comics Podcast: Bryan Edward Hill
item.description:
Welcome to Sunday Comics Podcast a place for comic fans everywhere and joining us today is writer Bryan Edward Hill who is not just a comic fan but also a creator who not only works in comics but also in tv and film. We dig into how he got his start in entertainment as well as his current projects like POSTAL a fictional town where ex-convicts secretly live together and the upcoming science fiction epic GOLGOTHA and the action packed comic ROMULUS

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 185 JK Woodward/Mark Russell and Steve
item.description:
This episode kicks off with a Free Comic Book Day preview from artist JK Woodward of his new book "Star Trek:The Next Generation- Broken Mirror", which depicts a "Mirror, Mirror" universe representation of the Next Generation cast. Written by frequent collaborators Scott and David Tipton, the first issue is available free on May 6 at your local comic shop.
Then Wendi is joined by the creative team behind the much heralded DC comic "The Flintstones". Part of the recent Hanna Barbera line, this reimagining of Bedrock's famous family depicts the changing society of the paleolithic era- from the angst of the armadillo bowling ball to Fred and Barney's time in the war. It captures existential dilemmas in a surprising fashion for a cartoon comic. Writer Mark Russell and artist Steve Pugh discuss their new interpretation and style and how they got away with something so daring, as well as what Russell has in mind for his new Snaggletooth comic.
Brought to you by www.blackphoenixalchemylab.com presenting a new line of fragrances and body products based on the Neil Gaiman novel, “American Gods”.
As well as www.dcbservice.com where you can find deep discounts and reliable service on all your favorite comics every day.
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 184 Ande Parks
item.description:
Exceptional gentleman, Ande Parks is the guest on this episode of "Double Page Spread" as he discusses over 20 yrs in the comic industry as an inker and writer. He goes in depth on inking technique, his longtime partnership with Phil Hester on DC books such as "Green Arrow" and "Nightwing", his writing credits for Dynamite on licensed characters "The Lone Ranger" and "Green Hornet", his relationship with Hollywood and almost having a property made with Michael Mann, the history of Kansas City, William Burroughs, Truman Capote and fancy hats!
Brought to you by www.blackphoenixalchemylab.com presenting a new line of fragrances and body products based on the Neil Gaiman novel, "American Gods".
As well as www.dcbservice.com where you can find deep discounts and reliable service on all your favorite comics every day.

item.title: Nothings On : Fate of the Furious
item.description:
This a special spotlight spoiler episode on the eighth installment of the Fast and the Furious franchise 'Fate of the Furious' directed by F Gary Gray and written by Chris Morgan. The film stars Vin Diesel, Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham, Michelle Rodriguez, Tyrese Gibson, Chris 'Ludacris' Bridges, Scott Eastwood, Nathalie Emmanuel, Elsa Pataky, Kurt Russell and Charlize Theron. And to help us with this very spoiler filled review , Darrell and Jim recruited the best team of podcasters in the world and they are Wendi Freeman, Julian Lytle, Rafael Sanz and Juan Castro.
Let us know what you are watching and we will read it on the show just email us at nothingsonpodcast@gmail.com

item.title: Sunday Comics Podcast: Ibrahim Moustafa

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 183 Ibrahim Moustafa
item.description:
Ibrahim Moustafa is the extraordinary artistic talent behind "High Crimes" and the WWII Nazi hunting espionage epic "Jaeger". He is a wealth of knowledge about all types of spy films and novels and together he and Wendi have a fantastic time discussing the minutiae of James Bond, John LeCarre, Michael Caine's Harry Palmer films, Man from UNCLE and so much more. Currently he has a Patreon where he is producing prints for various action films and has begun with images for every single James Bond movie!
You can help contribute and see his upcoming John Wick piece right here https://www.patreon.com/IbrahimMoustafa
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Star Wars Conversations - Reviews Rebels And Comics
item.description:
The reviews section of the seventeenth episode of our Star Wars fan podcast. Where two heroic scruffy looking nerf herders discuss a galaxy far, far away using the magic of the Internet.
Please subscribe to our channel and share.
Featured in this weeks episode:
Reviews:
Star Wars 29: Yoda's Secret War Part IV is the twenty-ninth issue of the Marvel comic book series Star Wars.
The issue is written by Jason Aaron, with art by Salvador Larroca. It is the fourth issue in a story arc set prior to Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace that features the character Yoda. The story is published on March 1, 2017.
Doctor Aphra 5: Book I, Part V is the fifth issue of the Marvel comic book series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra. The comic is written by Kieron Gillen with art by Kev Walker. It was released on March 8, 2017.
Social media stuff:

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 182- Zack Kruse
item.description:
The multi faceted Zack Kruse is a comic historian, PHD student, comic writer, columnist, convention organizer and podcaster. His inquisitive mind plumbs the depth of the medium, as seen in his recent columns for the "Eleven O'Clock Comics" blog, and on the "Pictures within Pictures" podcast with cohosts Ben Tiede and Will Pfeiffer. Together we talk about his ongoing research into the life and art of Steve Ditko, the political climate and philosophies that produce crime comics of the 40s, film noir, cosmopolitics and academia, and other lighter topics!
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Wade's World ep 13 The March is on
item.description:
After losing their last recording, Janet and Martheus re-record their last podcast for your listening entertainment. The Wade's (minus The Silky One), talk about the Kickstarter hit comic, Lonesomes, as well as their TOP 10 WTF moments on JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. Also, experience the joy of being finished with the second volume of Shinobi: Ninja Princess.
Show Notes: LONESOMES https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/monsteroftheweek1/lonesomes-issue-1
MAW PRODUCTIONS PATREON patreon.com/mawproductions
SHINOBI: NINJA PRINCESS https://www.comixology.com/Shinobi-Ninja-Princess/comics-series/22554?ref=c2VhcmNoL2luZGV4L2Rlc2t0b3Avc2xpZGVyTGlzdC9zZXJpZXNTbGlkZXI​ You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Peridyym Shift Episode 003: Gobblin’ deez Goblins!
item.description:
Hex, Mervis and Sellick attempt to fight for their sergeant when things LITERALLY go HORRIBLY WRONG!!!
Game Scenario based on The Goblin Undertaking, a Roll20.net –based adventure by Larry Roberts
Our players are
Bob Frantz – author of Monty The Dinosaur http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/monty-the-dinosaur-volume-1-bob-frantz/1124324032?ean=9781632292087
Anton Kromoff –Designer, writer: https://www.behance.net/antonkromob9ce
Jim Dietz — Social Media Strategist at Action Lab Entertainment: http://www.actionlabcomics.com
Dean Stahl—Artist/writer Headlock & Headaches http://www.headlocksandheadaches.com/hnhcomics/ladies-and-gentlemen/
Dennis Black & Asian – co-host to Dork Trek http://www.dorktrek.com/
John Bunger –Artist of Computer animation and illustration & DM of Douglas n Dragons! http://johnbunger.com/
Soundtracks provided by Kevin MacLeod’s Incompetech
https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/music.html
Contact us at
Facebook
www.facebook.com/peridyymshift
Twitter
www.twitter.com/peridyymshift
Email
peridyymshift@gmail.com
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork

item.title: Double Page Spread ep 181- Ruth and Darrin Sutherland
item.description:
Ruth and Darrin Sutherland are, without a doubt, very passionate and committed comic fans. Together they produce 3 separate podcasts on their favorite artists- Ron Randall of "Trekker", (Trekker Talk), Mike Grell (Warlord Worlds) and Mark Schultz of "Cenozoic Tales/Cadillacs and Dinosaurs" (Xenozoic Xenophiles). They dish about being married to someone with equally great taste, their many comic convention travels, maintaining professionalism and how scripted a podcast should be, Big Finish's "Doctor Who" audio plays, George Lazenby and more!
You can find links to all of their shows right here- https://radadventures.podbean.com
You can find other great podcasts on the network as well as comic and entertainment news by jumping on twitter and following @taylornetwork
